1.title: Bright Lights, Big City

episode of.title: Private Lives of Nashville Wives (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: The premiere episode introduces viewers to the wives during the most important week of the year in country music, the CMA Music Festival.

2.title: Fun Sponge

episode of.title: Private Lives of Nashville Wives (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: It is girls night out in Nashville, but not everyone has the same definition of fun. Erika questions whether being a stay-at-home mom is fulfilling enough now that the kids are in school, while Cassie and Gary Chapman are dying to have a child of their own... but a life-altering phone call may change everything.

3.title: Behind Closed Doors

episode of.title: Private Lives of Nashville Wives (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: You never know what goes on behind closed doors, especially in Nashville, until lyrics tell the story. Infidelity is the topic of conversation at Sarah's dinner party. Erika decides to throw herself back into her acting career, but she almost kills her chances of success when she creates obstacles at her first photo shoot.

4.title: Get Out

episode of.title: Private Lives of Nashville Wives (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Communication breakdowns cause rifts between friends... and lovers. Sarah sings her heart out in Cordele, Ga., but realizes that she can't control when the music just stops. Meanwhile, Cassie's husband, Gary Chapman, is back in the studio recording his first album in 10 years.

5.title: No Sad Songs

episode of.title: Private Lives of Nashville Wives (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: The ladies are challenged to be there for each other in times of need when Sarah shares important news with the others. Unfortunately, one of the other wives hijacks the conversation...again.

6.title: To Tell the Truth

episode of.title: Private Lives of Nashville Wives (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: A truth-or-dare party at Ana's sets the tone as the ladies take a rock-n-roll tour bus to Chicago for Sarah's show. The focus quickly shifts, however, when Erika loses it, and the group can't seem to get along.

7.title: Long Ride Home

episode of.title: Private Lives of Nashville Wives (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: After a long ride home from Chicago, the ladies search for deeper meaning in their lives as Cassie looks to broaden her philanthropic horizons. Ana gets herself back in the love game, while Jenny and JT put their love to the test.

8.title: Bless and Release

episode of.title: Private Lives of Nashville Wives (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: In the season finale, true feelings are finally shared, a broken heart is on the mend, and a bond forms like no other.

imdb.plot outline: One never knows what goes on behind closed doors- but in Nashville, the music tells the story. Against the backdrop of Music City, six of Nashville's most prominent women are searching for their place among this very modern, yet traditional Southern society where everyone knows each other's business. No secrets are safe with this group. Beyond the bright lights and big city you'll find that these women are just the perfect mix of country crazy with hearts of gold.
imdb.title: Private Lives of Nashville Wives
